trends: There have been 151 other sightings in San Diego
There were no other sightings in San Diego on or around December 30th 2000
divs: Sighting DetailsOn december 30, 2000 saturday morning Between 8am-8:50am I saw an UFO hooveringin my neighboorhood. I was on the way to work that morning and as I waited formy bus to arrive I turned to my right side and was not prepared for what Isaw.The people who also witnessed this said that it must be some governmentballon, because we are so near to miramar. I told them that it is wobblingaround back and forth and making a humming noise I dont think it any kind ofweather balloon! Just then it shot out a probe with brite white light andtriangle thing floating around it, circling the aircraft, without a sound. Thenit shot out another probe this time blue with a triangle thing on it doing thevery same thing. I knew this could be balloon. Everyone that saw this just shutup quick and walked away. I didnt I contacted you folks at MUFON.
